channel.title: Lighting Scythe
channel.description: Working on shading hope this is an OK example of shading [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1zykdp5.jpg[/img] Regular pictures below Please post your opinion on it and how to make it better

item.title: Lighting Scythe
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Death Infinity Death
item.description:
@Infinity_Death wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Could use a little more detail, good luck.

Thanks , I will add more detail to my next model i make

Read full topic

item.title: Lighting Scythe
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Infinity Death, post:9, topic:396498”][quote author=Ⅽole link=topic=493669.msg3610081#msg3610081 date=1306498843]

Looks like a 2 min job.

Good job, keep up the good work.

Dear God stop saying this. You tell them they’re doing something wrong and then immediately tell them to keep doing what they’re doing.
[/quote]
She’s just trying to give me constructive criticism as in saying take more time in your models and that’s her way of saying it it might be different but haven’t you seen the way she types yes ? she types yer,k you get the point I’m trying to make?
I hope so because i hate typing stuff this long :|[/quote]
I type “yer” because i don’t really like the way “yes” sounds, and in australia we don’t type “yar” either.

Also i am just trying to help them feel like making more models. The constructive criticism i give helps them think a little more so they know what they did wrong in a way, then ending it with a “Good job, keep up the good work” makes them want to fix it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Personally i don’t like it, you need to work on your ideas for this model. Looks like a 2 min job. Try make the plabe sharp like scythes normally are because right now itsj ust looking like a pickaxe to me. Good job, keep up the good work.
